TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator

span.span: Authenticates an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类对 安全令牌进行身份验证。Use the class to authenticate security tokens.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用 方法对令牌进行身份验证，则不会将 X.509 证书映射到 Windows 标识，也不会使用证书链来验证证书。When the method is called to authenticate the token, the X.509 certificate is not mapped to a Windows identity and the certificate is validated using a certificate chain.

summary.span: 使用指定的证书验证程序初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified certificate validator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一组预定义的证书验证模型，如 属性。The class provides a set of pre-defined certificate validation models, such as the property. 可以将这些验证模型传递给 `validator` 参数。These validation models can be passed to the `validator` parameter. 当应用程序要求使用自定义验证方法时，请从 中派生一个类，并重写 方法。When an application requires a custom validation method, derive a class from and override the method. 方法由 方法调用。The method is called by the method. 默认情况下， 不会将 X.509 证书映射到 Windows 标识。By default, the does not map the X.509 certificate to a Windows identity.

summary.span: 使用指定的证书验证方法初始化 类的新实例，并指示是否将证书标识映射到 Windows 标识。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified certificate validation method and indicates whether the identity of the certificate is mapped to a Windows identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一组预定义的证书验证模型，如 属性。The class provides a set of pre-defined certificate validation models, such as the property. 可以将这些验证模型传递给 `validator` 参数。These validation models can be passed to the `validator` parameter. 当应用程序要求使用自定义验证方法时，请从 中派生一个类，并重写 方法。When an application requires a custom validation method, derive a class from and override the method. 方法由 方法调用。The method is called by the method. 如果调用 方法对令牌进行身份验证并且 `mapToWindows` 为 `true`，则会将 X.509 证书映射到 Windows 帐户，并将声明添加到用户所属的 Windows 组所在的 中。When the method is called to authenticate the token and `mapToWindows` is `true`, the X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows account and claims are added to the with the Windows groups that the user belongs to. 将 X.509 证书映射到 Windows 帐户的方式取决于安全令牌类型：How the X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows account depends upon the security token type: - 如果安全令牌类型为 ，则使用 属性映射 X.509 证书。When the security token is of type , the X.509 certificate is mapped using the property. - 如果安全令牌类型为 `X509SecurityToken`，则使用 Windows 帐户的用户主要名称 (UPN) 将 X.509 证书映射到该帐户。When the security token is of type `X509SecurityToken`, the X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows account using its user principal name (UPN).

summary.span: 使用指定的证书验证方法初始化 类的新实例，并指示是否将证书标识映射到 Windows 标识以及用户所属的 Windows 组。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified certificate validation method and indicates whether the identity of the certificate is mapped to a Windows identity and the Windows groups the user belongs to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不需要 Windows 组信息，请将 `false` 传递给 `includeWindowsGroups` 参数以提高性能。Pass `false` to the `includeWindowsGroups` parameter when the Windows group information is not required to improve performance. 类有几个可传递给 参数的静态属性，如 `validator` 属性。The class has several static properties, such as the property that can be passed to the `validator` parameter. 这些属性为 X.509 证书提供了常用验证方法。These properties provide common validation methods for X.509 certificates. 当要求使用自定义验证方法时，请从 中派生一个类，并重写 方法。When a custom validation method is required, derive a class from and override the method. 方法由 方法调用。The method is called by the method. 如果将 `true` 传递给 `mapToWindows` 参数，则会将 X.509 证书映射到 Windows 帐户，并将相关声明添加到 中，如用户所属的 Windows 组。When `true` is passed into the `mapToWindows` parameter, the X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows account and relevant claims are added to the , such as the Windows groups that the user belongs to. 如果安全令牌类型为 ，则 属性使用在令牌中指定的标识；否则，将 X.509 证书映射到使用 Kerberos S4U 登录的 Windows 标识（基于 X.509 证书的用户主要名称 SubjectAltNames 扩展）。When the security token is of type , the property is using the identity that is specified in the token; otherwise, the X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows identity using a Kerberos S4U logon based on the user principal name SubjectAltNames extension of the X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不对安全令牌进行身份验证；该操作由 方法执行。The method does not authenticate the security token; that is performed by the method.

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示是否将 X.509 证书映射到 Windows 帐户。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether to map the X.509 certificate to a Windows account.

value.span: 若要将 X.509 证书映射到 Windows 帐户，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to map the X.509 certificate to a Windows account; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能在构造函数中设置 属性。The property can only be set in a constructor. 如果使用传输级 SSL 或 HTTPS 安全性，并且基础安全通道或 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 已提供了映射，则应用该映射而不进行链验证。If transport-level SSL or HTTPS security is being used and mapping is already provided by the underlying security channel or by Internet Information Services (IIS), then that mapping is applied with no chain-validation. 否则，在进行映射之前，应使用证书链验证证书，并且证书必须链接到 NT_AUTHORITY 标识。Otherwise, prior to doing the mapping, the certificate is validated using a certificate chain, and the certificate must chain to an NT_AUTHORITY identity. 中定义，使用的链结构对应于 CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_NT_AUTH`CertVerifyCertificateChainPolicy`函数 (请参阅[CertVerifyCertificateChainPolicy](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=83570)加密 SDK 中的函数)。The chain structure used corresponds to the CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_NT_AUTH as defined in the `CertVerifyCertificateChainPolicy` function (see the [CertVerifyCertificateChainPolicy](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=83570) function in the Cryptography SDK). 只有在将证书映射到 Windows 帐户时，才会发生此行为。This behavior only occurs when mapping a certificate to a Windows account.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> ValidateTokenCore (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token);

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> ValidateTokenCore(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ValidateTokenCore (token As SecurityToken) As ReadOnlyCollection(Of IAuthorizationPolicy)

protected: override System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::IdentityModel::Policy::IAuthorizationPolicy ^> ^ ValidateTokenCore(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ token);

span.span: The to be validated.

summary.span: 对指定的安全令牌进行身份验证，并返回该安全令牌的授权策略集。

span.span: Authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.

returns.span: 一个类型为 的 ，它包含对此应用程序生效的授权策略集。

span.span: A of type that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写 方法时，请遵循下列准则：When the method is overridden, follow these guidelines: - 当无法验证传递给 `token` 参数的安全令牌时，将引发 异常。When the security token passed into the `token` parameter cannot be validated, throw the exception. - 当不存在对此应用程序生效的授权策略时，返回 类型的空 。When there are no authorization policies in effect for this application, return an empty of type . 当此方法返回 `null` 时，[!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] 将引发 异常。When `null` is returned by this method, [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] throws the exception. 方法调用在构造函数中指定的验证方法的 方法，以便对 `token` 参数进行身份验证。The method calls the method of the validation method specified in the constructor to authenticate the `token` parameter.
